/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the cityscape. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades predominantly white and gray, punctuated by occasional splashes of red and green. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, adding a touch of urban charm to the landscape. In the distance, a bridge arches over the street, connecting two parts of the city. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's architectural diversity and vibrant energy.
